title: How to say “Hi dear all friends” - Quora

response.answer_text: How do you say “Hi dear all friends”? Well, aside from the fact that we do not use the word “dear” to address people in North America (except in correspondence and other very specific contexts) I would say it like this: hi, allhi y’allhi guyshello my friends
Hi dear friends Hi all friends Dear friends You wouldn't use hi, dear, and all together in this case.
